languages.text: "Что?! Прокля..." {n}Голова Владайма взрывается кровавыми брызгами, и тело Наместника, преступного главаря и вооруженного мятежника рушится на пол. Треснувшие очки, слетев с переносицы, мертвенно блестят.{/n}

"What? Damn—" {n}Vladaym's head explodes, spraying blood everywhere. Liege, criminal kingpin, armed rebel — all that he was, now reduced to a corpse hitting the floor with a thud. His glasses fly off his nose and lie cracked and glinting lifelessly.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Что?! Прокля..." {n}Голова Владайма взрывается кровавыми брызгами, и тело Наместника, преступного главаря и вооруженного мятежника рушится на пол. Треснувшие очки, слетев с переносицы, мертвенно блестят.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "What? Damn—" {n}Vladaym's head explodes, spraying blood everywhere. Liege, criminal kingpin, armed rebel — all of that is now but a corpse hitting the floor with a thud. His glasses fly off his nose and lie cracked and glinting lifelessly.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "What? Damn—" {n}Vladaym's head explodes, spraying blood everywhere. Liege, criminal kingpin, armed rebel — all that he was, now reduced to a corpse hitting the floor with a thud. His glasses fly off his nose and lie cracked and glinting lifelessly.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: “什么？该死——”{n}弗拉迪姆的头炸开了，鲜血四溅。总督、罪犯集团头目、武装叛乱者……这所有的身份，如今都失去了意义。这一刻，他变成了一具冰冷的尸体，“砰”地一声砸在地板上。他的眼镜从鼻梁上飞了下来，摔得粉碎，毫无生气地泛着光。{/n}
languages.original_text: "What? Damn—" {n}Vladaym's head explodes, spraying blood everywhere. Liege, criminal kingpin, armed rebel — all that he was, now reduced to a corpse hitting the floor with a thud. His glasses fly off his nose and lie cracked and glinting lifelessly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “什么？该死——”{n}弗拉迪姆的头炸开了，鲜血四溅。总督、罪犯集团头目、武装叛乱者……这所有的身份，如今都失去了意义。他仅仅变成了一具尸体，“砰”地一声砸在地板上。他的眼镜从鼻梁上飞了下来，摔得粉碎，毫无生气地闪烁着。{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: 「なんだと？クソが…」{n}ヴラダイムの頭は爆発し、辺り一面に血をまき散らした。領主、犯罪王、そして武装した反乱軍…そのすべてである彼は、今やドスンと床に倒れ伏す死体でしかなくなった。眼鏡は鼻からとび外れ、ひび割れ、生気のない光を放ちながら横たわっている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "What? Damn—" {n}Vladaym's head explodes, spraying blood everywhere. Liege, criminal kingpin, armed rebel — all that he was, now reduced to a corpse hitting the floor with a thud. His glasses fly off his nose and lie cracked and glinting lifelessly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「なんだと？クソが…」{n}ヴラダイムの頭は爆発し、辺り一面に血をまき散らした。領主、犯罪王、そして武装した反乱軍…そのすべてである彼は、今やドスンと床に倒れ伏す死体でしかなくなった。眼鏡は鼻からとび外れ、ひび割れ、生気のない光を放ちながら横たわっている。{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: «¿Qué? Maldita sea...». {n}La cabeza de Vladaym explota, llenando todo de sangre. Señor, cerebro criminal, rebelde armado... todo lo que era, reducido a un cadáver que cae al suelo con ruido sordo. Sus gafas salen volando y caen al suelo, agrietadas y sin vida.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What? Damn—" {n}Vladaym's head explodes, spraying blood everywhere. Liege, criminal kingpin, armed rebel — all that he was, now reduced to a corpse hitting the floor with a thud. His glasses fly off his nose and lie cracked and glinting lifelessly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué? Maldita sea...». {n}La cabeza de Vladaym explota, llenando todo de sangre. Señor, cerebro criminal, rebelde armado... Todo eso no es más que un cadáver que cae al suelo con ruido sordo. Sus gafas salen volando y yacen en el suelo agrietadas y sin vida.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Was? Verdammt-" {n}Vladayms Kopf explodiert mit einem gewaltigen Blutregen. Lehnsherr, Verbrecherboss, bewaffneter Rebell — alles, was er war, wird zu einer Leiche reduziert, die mit einem dumpfen Knall zu Boden sackt. Seine Brille fliegt ihm von der Nase und liegt zerbrochen und leblos funkelnd neben ihm.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What? Damn—" {n}Vladaym's head explodes, spraying blood everywhere. Liege, criminal kingpin, armed rebel — all that he was, now reduced to a corpse hitting the floor with a thud. His glasses fly off his nose and lie cracked and glinting lifelessly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Was? Verdammt-" {n}Vladayms Kopf explodiert mit einem gewaltigen Blutregen. Lehnsherr, Verbrecherboss, bewaffnete Rebel — all das ist nur noch eine Leiche, die mit einem dumpfen Knall zu Boden sackt. Seine Brille fliegt ihm von der Nase und liegt zerbrochen und leblos funkelnd neben ihm.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: « Comment ? Soyez... » {n}La tête de Vladaym éclate dans une gerbe de sang. Tour à tour suzerain, baron du crime et rebelle, il n'est désormais plus qu'un cadavre qui s'effondre dans un bruit sourd. Ses lunettes fêlées lui tombent du nez et glissent sur le sol.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What? Damn—" {n}Vladaym's head explodes, spraying blood everywhere. Liege, criminal kingpin, armed rebel — all that he was, now reduced to a corpse hitting the floor with a thud. His glasses fly off his nose and lie cracked and glinting lifelessly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Quoi ? Soyez... » {n}La tête de Vladaym éclate dans une gerbe de sang. Tour à tour suzerain, baron du crime et rebelle, il n'est désormais plus qu'un cadavre qui s'effondre dans un bruit sourd. Ses lunettes fêlées lui tombent du nez et glissent sur le sol.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Ne? Lanet..." {n}Vladaym'ın kafası patlıyor ve her yere kan saçılıyor. Emîr, suç baronu, silahlı isyancı... Hayatı boyunca tüm yaptıkları, artık bir ceset olarak yerde yatıyor. Cansız bir şekilde parlayan, çatlamış gözlüğü ise burnunun üzerinden kayıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What? Damn—" {n}Vladaym's head explodes, spraying blood everywhere. Liege, criminal kingpin, armed rebel — all that he was, now reduced to a corpse hitting the floor with a thud. His glasses fly off his nose and lie cracked and glinting lifelessly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ne? Lanet..." {n}Vladaym'ın kafası patlıyor ve her yere kan saçılıyor. Emîr, Suç baronu, silahlı isyancı... Hayatı boyunca tüm yaptıkları, artık bir ceset olarak yerde yatıyor. Cansız bir şekilde parlayan çatlamış gözlüğü burnundan fırlıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04
